page.title: 07Ernesford Community College
page.content: Ernesford Grange Community College is a focal point because of the number of courses it offers to the community that surrounds it. The school opened in 1970 and it is estimated that over 3,000 people apart from school children use the schools facilities. The swimming pool is the most used facility. Even teachers use the sports complex with visiting staffs from other schools. Unemployment in Coventry means that there is a greater need for this centre and so fees are kept as low as possible. The Deputy Head of the school said that although the school is one of the most used in the city it is also one of the least vandalised. There is little trouble from the community and the amenities are really appreciated by everyone.
